verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֨ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֧ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֛ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses בְּמִדְבַּ֥ר <S%H4057><s%> in the wilderness סִינַ֖י <S%H5514><s%> of Sinai בְּאֹ֣הֶל <S%H168><s%> in the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֑ד <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation בְּאֶחָד֩ <S%H259><s%> on the first לַחֹ֨דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> month הַשֵּׁנִ֜י <S%H8145><s%> [day] of the second בַּשָּׁנָ֣ה <S%H8141><s%> year הַשֵּׁנִ֗ית <S%H8145><s%> in the second לְצֵאתָ֛ם <S%H3318><s%> after they were come out מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land מִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

שְׂא֗וּ <S%H5375><s%> Take אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רֹאשׁ֙ <S%H7218><s%> ye the sum כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all עֲדַ֣ת <S%H5712><s%> of all the congregation בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֖ם <S%H4940><s%> after their families לְבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> by the house אֲבֹתָ֑ם <S%H1><s%> of their fathers בְּמִסְפַּ֣ר <S%H4557><s%> with the number שֵׁמ֔וֹת <S%H8034><s%> of [their] names כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every זָכָ֖ר <S%H2145><s%> every male לְגֻלְגְּלֹתָֽם׃ <S%H1538><s%> by their polls

מִבֶּ֨ן <S%H1121><s%> old עֶשְׂרִ֤ים <S%H6242><s%> From twenty שָׁנָה֙ <S%H8141><s%> years וָמַ֔עְלָה <S%H4605><s%> and upward כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> whoever יֹצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> all that are able to go forth צָבָ֖א <S%H6635><s%> to war בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> in Israel תִּפְקְד֥וּ <S%H6485><s%> shall number אֹתָ֛ם <S%H853><s%> לְצִבְאֹתָ֖ם <S%H6635><s%> them by their armies אַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> you וְאַהֲרֹֽן׃ <S%H175><s%> thou and Aaron

וְאִתְּכֶ֣ם <S%H854><s%> for יִהְי֔וּ <S%H1961><s%> shall be a אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> And with you there shall be a man אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> of every לַמַּטֶּ֑ה <S%H4294><s%> tribe אִ֛ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every one רֹ֥אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> head לְבֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> of the house אֲבֹתָ֖יו <S%H1><s%> of his fathers הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he

וְאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <S%H428><s%> These שְׁמ֣וֹת <S%H8034><s%> And these [are] the names הָֽאֲנָשִׁ֔ים <S%H376><s%> of the men אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who יַֽעַמְד֖וּ <S%H5975><s%> that shall stand אִתְּכֶ֑ם <S%H854><s%> for לִרְאוּבֵ֕ן <S%H7205><s%> with you of [the tribe of] Reuben אֱלִיצ֖וּר <S%H468><s%> Elizur בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son שְׁדֵיאֽוּר׃ <S%H7707><s%> of Shedeur
לְשִׁמְע֕וֹן <S%H8095><s%> Of Simeon שְׁלֻמִיאֵ֖ל <S%H8017><s%> Shelumiel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son צוּרִֽישַׁדָּֽי׃ <S%H6701><s%> of Zurishaddai
לִֽיהוּדָ֕ה <S%H3063><s%> Of Judah נַחְשׁ֖וֹן <S%H5177><s%> Nahshon בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son עַמִּינָדָֽב׃ <S%H5992><s%> of Amminadab
לְיִ֨שָּׂשכָ֔ר <S%H3485><s%> Of Issachar נְתַנְאֵ֖ל <S%H5417><s%> Nethaneel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son צוּעָֽר׃ <S%H6686><s%> of Zuar
לִזְבוּלֻ֕ן <S%H2074><s%> Of Zebulun אֱלִיאָ֖ב <S%H446><s%> Eliab בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son חֵלֹֽן׃ <S%H2497><s%> of Helon

לִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> Of the children יוֹסֵ֔ף <S%H3130><s%> of Joseph לְאֶפְרַ֕יִם <S%H669><s%> of Ephraim אֱלִישָׁמָ֖ע <S%H476><s%> Elishama בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son עַמִּיה֑וּד <S%H5989><s%> of Ammihud לִמְנַשֶּׁ֕ה <S%H4519><s%> of Manasseh גַּמְלִיאֵ֖ל <S%H1583><s%> Gamaliel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son פְּדָהצֽוּר׃ <S%H6301><s%> of Pedahzur
לְבִ֨נְיָמִ֔ן <S%H1144><s%> Of Benjamin אֲבִידָ֖ן <S%H27><s%> Abidan בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son גִּדְעֹנִֽי׃ <S%H1441><s%> of Gideoni
לְדָ֕ן <S%H1835><s%> Of Dan אֲחִיעֶ֖זֶר <S%H295><s%> Ahiezer בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son עַמִּֽישַׁדָּֽי׃ <S%H5996><s%> of Ammishaddai
לְאָשֵׁ֕ר <S%H836><s%> Of Asher פַּגְעִיאֵ֖ל <S%H6295><s%> Pagiel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son עָכְרָֽן׃ <S%H5918><s%> of Ocran
לְגָ֕ד <S%H1410><s%> Of Gad אֶלְיָסָ֖ף <S%H460><s%> Eliasaph בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son דְּעוּאֵֽל׃ <S%H1845><s%> of Deuel
לְנַ֨פְתָּלִ֔י <S%H5321><s%> Of Naphtali אֲחִירַ֖ע <S%H299><s%> Ahira בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son עֵינָֽן׃ <S%H5881><s%> of Enan

אֵ֚לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These [קְרִיאֵי כ] (קְרוּאֵ֣י <S%H7148><s%> famous ק) הָעֵדָ֔ה <S%H5712><s%> of the congregation נְשִׂיאֵ֖י <S%H5387><s%> princes מַטּ֣וֹת <S%H4294><s%> of the tribes אֲבוֹתָ֑ם <S%H1><s%> of their fathers רָאשֵׁ֛י <S%H7218><s%> heads אַלְפֵ֥י <S%H505><s%> of thousands יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel הֵֽם׃ <S%H1992><s%> in

וַיִּקַּ֥ח <S%H3947><s%> took מֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses וְאַהֲרֹ֑ן <S%H175><s%> and Aaron אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> הָאֲנָשִׁ֣ים <S%H582><s%> these men הָאֵ֔לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who נִקְּב֖וּ <S%H5344><s%> which are expressed בְּשֵׁמֽוֹת׃ <S%H8034><s%> by [their] names

וְאֵ֨ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעֵדָ֜ה <S%H5712><s%> all the congregation הִקְהִ֗ילוּ <S%H6950><s%> together בְּאֶחָד֙ <S%H259><s%> on the first לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> month הַשֵּׁנִ֔י <S%H8145><s%> [day] of the second וַיִּתְיַֽלְד֥וּ <S%H3205><s%> and they declared their pedigrees עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in מִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֖ם <S%H4940><s%> after their families לְבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> by the house אֲבֹתָ֑ם <S%H1><s%> of their fathers בְּמִסְפַּ֣ר <S%H4557><s%> according to the number שֵׁמ֗וֹת <S%H8034><s%> of the names מִבֶּ֨ן <S%H1121><s%> old עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> from twenty שָׁנָ֛ה <S%H8141><s%> years וָמַ֖עְלָה <S%H4605><s%> and upward לְגֻלְגְּלֹתָֽם׃ <S%H1538><s%> by their polls

כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> after צִוָּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> As the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֹשֶׁ֑ה <S%H4872><s%> Moses וַֽיִּפְקְדֵ֖ם <S%H6485><s%> so he numbered בְּמִדְבַּ֥ר <S%H4057><s%> them in the wilderness סִינָֽי׃ <S%H5514><s%> of Sinai פ

וַיִּהְי֤וּ <S%H1961><s%> become בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> And the children רְאוּבֵן֙ <S%H7205><s%> of Reuben בְּכֹ֣ר <S%H1060><s%> eldest son יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel's תּוֹלְדֹתָ֥ם <S%H8435><s%> by their generations לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֖ם <S%H4940><s%> after their families לְבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> by the house אֲבֹתָ֑ם <S%H1><s%> of their fathers בְּמִסְפַּ֤ר <S%H4557><s%> according to the number שֵׁמוֹת֙ <S%H8034><s%> of the names לְגֻלְגְּלֹתָ֔ם <S%H1538><s%> by their polls כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every זָכָ֗ר <S%H2145><s%> every male מִבֶּ֨ן <S%H1121><s%> old עֶשְׂרִ֤ים <S%H6242><s%> from twenty שָׁנָה֙ <S%H8141><s%> years וָמַ֔עְלָה <S%H4605><s%> and upward כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> whoever יֹצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> all that were able to go forth צָבָֽא׃ <S%H6635><s%> to war

פְּקֻדֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H6485><s%> Those that were numbered לְמַטֵּ֣ה <S%H4294><s%> of them [even] of the tribe רְאוּבֵ֑ן <S%H7205><s%> of Reuben שִׁשָּׁ֧ה <S%H8337><s%> and six וְאַרְבָּעִ֛ים <S%H705><s%> [were] forty אֶ֖לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand וַחֲמֵ֥שׁ <S%H2568><s%> and five מֵאֽוֹת׃ <S%H3967><s%> hundred פ

לִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> Of the children שִׁמְע֔וֹן <S%H8095><s%> of Simeon תּוֹלְדֹתָ֥ם <S%H8435><s%> by their generations לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֖ם <S%H4940><s%> after their families לְבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> by the house אֲבֹתָ֑ם <S%H1><s%> of their fathers פְּקֻדָ֗יו <S%H6485><s%> those that were numbered בְּמִסְפַּ֤ר <S%H4557><s%> of them according to the number שֵׁמוֹת֙ <S%H8034><s%> of the names לְגֻלְגְּלֹתָ֔ם <S%H1538><s%> by their polls כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every זָכָ֗ר <S%H2145><s%> every male מִבֶּ֨ן <S%H1121><s%> old עֶשְׂרִ֤ים <S%H6242><s%> from twenty שָׁנָה֙ <S%H8141><s%> years וָמַ֔עְלָה <S%H4605><s%> and upward כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> whoever יֹצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> all that were able to go forth צָבָֽא׃ <S%H6635><s%> to war

פְּקֻדֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H6485><s%> Those that were numbered לְמַטֵּ֣ה <S%H4294><s%> of them [even] of the tribe שִׁמְע֑וֹן <S%H8095><s%> of Simeon תִּשְׁעָ֧ה <S%H8672><s%> and nine וַחֲמִשִּׁ֛ים <S%H2572><s%> [were] fifty אֶ֖לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand וּשְׁלֹ֥שׁ <S%H7969><s%> and three מֵאֽוֹת׃ <S%H3967><s%> hundred פ

לִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> Of the children גָ֔ד <S%H1410><s%> of Gad תּוֹלְדֹתָ֥ם <S%H8435><s%> by their generations לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֖ם <S%H4940><s%> after their families לְבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> by the house אֲבֹתָ֑ם <S%H1><s%> of their fathers בְּמִסְפַּ֣ר <S%H4557><s%> according to the number שֵׁמ֗וֹת <S%H8034><s%> of the names מִבֶּ֨ן <S%H1121><s%> old עֶשְׂרִ֤ים <S%H6242><s%> from twenty שָׁנָה֙ <S%H8141><s%> years וָמַ֔עְלָה <S%H4605><s%> and upward כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> whoever יֹצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> all that were able to go forth צָבָֽא׃ <S%H6635><s%> to war

פְּקֻדֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H6485><s%> Those that were numbered לְמַטֵּ֣ה <S%H4294><s%> of them [even] of the tribe גָ֑ד <S%H1410><s%> of Gad חֲמִשָּׁ֤ה <S%H2568><s%> and five וְאַרְבָּעִים֙ <S%H705><s%> [were] forty אֶ֔לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand וְשֵׁ֥שׁ <S%H8337><s%> six מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred וַחֲמִשִּֽׁים׃ <S%H2572><s%> and fifty פ

לִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> Of the children יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah תּוֹלְדֹתָ֥ם <S%H8435><s%> by their generations לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֖ם <S%H4940><s%> after their families לְבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> by the house אֲבֹתָ֑ם <S%H1><s%> of their fathers בְּמִסְפַּ֣ר <S%H4557><s%> according to the number שֵׁמֹ֗ת <S%H8034><s%> of the names מִבֶּ֨ן <S%H1121><s%> old עֶשְׂרִ֤ים <S%H6242><s%> from twenty שָׁנָה֙ <S%H8141><s%> years וָמַ֔עְלָה <S%H4605><s%> and upward כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> whoever יֹצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> all that were able to go forth צָבָֽא׃ <S%H6635><s%> to war

פְּקֻדֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H6485><s%> Those that were numbered לְמַטֵּ֣ה <S%H4294><s%> of them [even] of the tribe יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah אַרְבָּעָ֧ה <S%H702><s%> four וְשִׁבְעִ֛ים <S%H7657><s%> seventy אֶ֖לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand וְשֵׁ֥שׁ <S%H8337><s%> and six מֵאֽוֹת׃ <S%H3967><s%> hundred פ

לִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> Of the children יִשָּׂשכָ֔ר <S%H3485><s%> of Issachar תּוֹלְדֹתָ֥ם <S%H8435><s%> by their generations לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֖ם <S%H4940><s%> after their families לְבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> by the house אֲבֹתָ֑ם <S%H1><s%> of their fathers בְּמִסְפַּ֣ר <S%H4557><s%> according to the number שֵׁמֹ֗ת <S%H8034><s%> of the names מִבֶּ֨ן <S%H1121><s%> old עֶשְׂרִ֤ים <S%H6242><s%> from twenty שָׁנָה֙ <S%H8141><s%> years וָמַ֔עְלָה <S%H4605><s%> and upward כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> whoever יֹצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> all that were able to go forth צָבָֽא׃ <S%H6635><s%> to war

פְּקֻדֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H6485><s%> Those that were numbered לְמַטֵּ֣ה <S%H4294><s%> of them [even] of the tribe יִשָּׂשכָ֑ר <S%H3485><s%> of Issachar אַרְבָּעָ֧ה <S%H702><s%> and four וַחֲמִשִּׁ֛ים <S%H2572><s%> [were] fifty אֶ֖לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand וְאַרְבַּ֥ע <S%H702><s%> and four מֵאֽוֹת׃ <S%H3967><s%> hundred פ

לִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> Of the children זְבוּלֻ֔ן <S%H2074><s%> of Zebulun תּוֹלְדֹתָ֥ם <S%H8435><s%> by their generations לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֖ם <S%H4940><s%> after their families לְבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> by the house אֲבֹתָ֑ם <S%H1><s%> of their fathers בְּמִסְפַּ֣ר <S%H4557><s%> according to the number שֵׁמֹ֗ת <S%H8034><s%> of the names מִבֶּ֨ן <S%H1121><s%> old עֶשְׂרִ֤ים <S%H6242><s%> from twenty שָׁנָה֙ <S%H8141><s%> years וָמַ֔עְלָה <S%H4605><s%> and upward כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> whoever יֹצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> all that were able to go forth צָבָֽא׃ <S%H6635><s%> to war

וְאַתָּ֡ה <S%H859><s%> you הַפְקֵ֣ד <S%H6485><s%> But thou shalt appoint אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַלְוִיִּם֩ <S%H3881><s%> the Levites עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over מִשְׁכַּ֨ן <S%H4908><s%> over the tabernacle הָעֵדֻ֜ת <S%H5715><s%> of testimony וְעַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> and over כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all כֵּלָיו֮ <S%H3627><s%> and over all the vessels וְעַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> and over כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after לוֹ֒ הֵ֜מָּה <S%H1992><s%> They יִשְׂא֤וּ <S%H5375><s%> thereof and over all things that [belong] to it they shall bear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמִּשְׁכָּן֙ <S%H4908><s%> the tabernacle וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all כֵּלָ֔יו <S%H3627><s%> and all the vessels וְהֵ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> and they יְשָׁרְתֻ֑הוּ <S%H8334><s%> thereof and they shall minister וְסָבִ֥יב <S%H5439><s%> round about לַמִּשְׁכָּ֖ן <S%H4908><s%> the tabernacle יַחֲנֽוּ׃ <S%H2583><s%> unto it and shall encamp

וּבִנְסֹ֣עַ <S%H5265><s%> setteth forward הַמִּשְׁכָּ֗ן <S%H4908><s%> And when the tabernacle יוֹרִ֤ידוּ <S%H3381><s%> shall take it down אֹתוֹ֙ <S%H853><s%> הַלְוִיִּ֔ם <S%H3881><s%> the Levites וּבַחֲנֹת֙ <S%H2583><s%> is to be pitched הַמִּשְׁכָּ֔ן <S%H4908><s%> and when the tabernacle יָקִ֥ימוּ <S%H6965><s%> shall set it up אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> הַלְוִיִּ֑ם <S%H3881><s%> the Levites וְהַזָּ֥ר <S%H2114><s%> and the stranger הַקָּרֵ֖ב <S%H7126><s%> approach יוּמָֽת׃ <S%H4191><s%> shall be put to death
